name: Bill Purchase Register Report
query:
SELECT
    P.name AS 'ID',
    P.date AS 'Date',
    P.bank_account AS 'Bank Account',
    P.customer AS 'Customer',
    P.amount AS 'Amount',
    P.no AS 'No',
    P.spread AS 'Spread Percentage',
    P.subsequent AS 'Subsequent Percentage',
    P.interest AS 'Interest Percentage',
    P.total AS 'Total',
    P.currency AS 'Currency',
    P.amount_in_currency AS 'Amount in Currency',
    P.exchange_rate AS 'Total Exchange rate',
    PC.invoice_number AS 'Invoice Number ',
    PC.invoice_due_date AS 'Invoice Due Date ',
    PC.exchange_rate AS 'Exchange Rate '
FROM
    `tabBill Purchase` AS P
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBill Purchase Child` AS PC ON P.name = PC.parent
WHERE
    P.docstatus = 1;
